duties_responsibilities.duty: Handles inbound and outbound leads in a call-center environment
The first point of contact for prospects, the voice of the company
Qualifies leads by understanding the homeowner’s energy costs, pre-screening the suitability of solar through satellite tools and scheduling in-home appointments
Listens to homeowner interests and concerns while providing feedback relevant to that specific homeowner
Maintains high end-customer satisfaction by guiding quality prospects through the sales channel and process
Accurately captures all customer related data into SalesForce (CRM)
Works with lead transfer and appointment process issues
Meet and exceed monthly quotas and service level agreements while working in a fast-paced environment
Develops into a subject matter expert on the solar industry and on selling SunPower products
Willingness to be available and work outside of standard business hours, those that are most convenient to CA residential homeowners
